Arm I : Patients receive single collagenase injection target finger cord day 0 . Arm II : Patients receive single placebo injection arm I . Both arm : After 1 month evaluation , patient unresponsive treatment may receive monthly injection collagenase maximum 5 injection . Beginning 1 day completion treatment , patient use joint nighttime extension splint 4 month perform finger flexion/extension exercise .
